description: A simple but delicious warm salad with plenty of herby green goodness and a bit of spice.
keywords: Grilled Zucchini, Pea & Mixed Grain Salad with Mint
name: Grilled Zucchini, Pea & Mixed Grain Salad with Mint Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the peas, zucchini, spring onions, fresh mint and cracked black pepper to the grains, mix well and serve.
